message.content:
cs.IT, cs.SP, cs.LG, cs.MM, cs.NA 

The paper discusses the application of belief propagation to compressed sensing and estimation problems, which are typically studied in the information theory (cs.IT) and signal processing (cs.SP) sub-categories. The paper also presents detailed equations for implementing relaxed BP for general channels, which involves analyzing the behavior of the algorithm in large sparse limit, a topic that is relevant to the machine learning (cs.LG) and numerical analysis (cs.NA) sub-categories. Finally, the paper discusses applications to estimation with bounded noise, which is a topic that is relevant to the multimedia (cs.MM) sub-category.
